## Opgave 5

Replicate slide 6


```{r}

slide_6 <- function(sigma) {
  x <- MASS::mvrnorm(
    n = 100,
    mu = c(0, 0),
    Sigma = matrix(c(1, sigma, sigma, 1),
      nrow = 2
    )
  )

  y <- x[, 1] - x[, 2] + rnorm(100)

  mod_lm <- lm(y ~ 0 + x)
  summary(mod_lm)
}

slide_6(0)
slide_6(0.5)
slide_6(0.9)
```
